local_intent: Execute the primary leftward push on the T-block (0.1 m at 180°) after alignment.
assumptions: Yaw 180° corresponds to the leftward push direction in this scene.
Block_T remains visible immediately after the push.
ApproachAndAlign suffices without an explicit MoveAbove step for this contact pose.
coherence_with_global: Implements the first push step of GLOBAL_BT using Detect→Align→SetYaw→Push and a brief visibility check; parameters match the global plan (distance=0.1, direction=180°, timeouts binned).
